title: Transhumanity draws near
author: VD
content_html: We’re very close to releasing TRANSHUMAN AND SUBHUMAN: Essays on Science Fiction and Awful Truth by John C. Wright. You can, if you are so inclined, have an early look at the cover along with the Introduction by Michael Flynn at Mr. Wright’s site. It is a selection of the very best of Mr. Wright’s reliably brilliant essays.
content_text:
We’re very close to releasing
TRANSHUMAN AND SUBHUMAN: Essays on Science Fiction and Awful Truth
by John C. Wright. You can, if you are so inclined, have an early look at the cover along with the Introduction by Michael Flynn
at Mr. Wright’s site
. It is a selection of the very best of Mr. Wright’s reliably brilliant essays.
